## Asset / Content Submission

- Lane: (Public / Press / Scholar / Institutional)
- Reading Grade:
- Issue (if applicable):
- New or Revision:
- Version Incremented: Yes / No

### Checks
- [ ] Lane rules followed
- [ ] Grade target met
- [ ] No cross-lane reuse
- [ ] Versioning applied

## Version Consistency Check (Required)

For each artifact modified in this PR:

- [ ] Markdown version matches DOCX / Pages version
- [ ] DOCX / Pages version matches PDF version
- [ ] No older version remains marked as current
- [ ] Version bump follows policy (MAJOR vs MINOR)

### Failure Rule
If any format version differs, this PR must not be merged.
